name: Super Fish'n 2020
description:
Fish'n, as we know it, no longer exists in the year 2020. For years, the omnipotent "Super Fish'n Association" has been making a fortune using robotic "power fishers" against the best and strongest fish.

Created by @conk-juice, @Compelling Games, and @FifoIronton for the GMTK GameJam 2020
